sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom'; import {BACK_URL, DOMAIN_URL} from '../../http'; const Navigation = () => { const [apropos, setApropos] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchApropos = () => { axios .get(`${BACK_URL}/a-propos`) .then(res => setApropos(res.data[0])) } fetchApropos() }, []); return (

{apropos.firstname} {apropos.lastname}

  • Acceuil
  • Compétences
  • Réalisations
  • Expérience
  • Diplômes
  • Intérêts
  • Contact
); }; export default Navigation;
